inputs.name: Corner Length
inputs.description: The length of any leg of a custom section where two or more walls meet.

inputs.name: Color-code by Length
inputs.description: Set to true to visualize wall sections colored according to their length.

outputs.name: Non-Standard Panel Count
outputs.description: The number of panels that are neither the corner nor the designated panel length.

outputs.name: Unique Lengths Count
outputs.description: The number of unique panel lengths generated.
